item.title: 7 Habits of Effective Websites
item.description: This weekâ€™s Cork Open Coffee is taking place Friday the 11th of June at 10am in The Rubicon Centre in Bishopstown in Cork (Map). 7 Habits of Effective Websites Frank Prendergast is a well known and respected Web Designer based in Cork and will give a brief talk on Search Engine Optimisation (SEO) and then open up the topic for further discussion with the group. Frank has been working in the web industry for over ten years and likes to work with small to medium sized businesses developing or revamping their web presence.
